title: OGD4All：基于大型语言模型的地理空间开放政府数据的无障碍交互框架
content:
arXiv:2602.00012v1 公告类型：新 
摘要：我们提出了 OGD4All，这是一个基于大型语言模型 (LLM) 的透明、可审计和可复制的框架，旨在增强公民与地理空间开放政府数据 (OGD) 的交互。该系统结合了语义数据检索、代理推理
original_title: OGD4All: A Framework for Accessible Interaction with Geospatial Open Government Data Based on Large Language Models
original_content:
arXiv:2602.00012v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: We present OGD4All, a transparent, auditable, and reproducible framework based on Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance citizens' interaction with geospatial Open Government Data (OGD). The system combines semantic data retrieval, agentic reasoning

title: OpenAI 推出新的 macOS 应用程序用于代理编码
content: OpenAI 为 Codex 发布了一款新的 macOS 应用程序，集成了自去年 Codex 推出以来流行的许多代理编码实践。
original_title: OpenAI launches new macOS app for agentic coding
original_content: OpenAI has released a new macOS app for Codex, integrating many of the agentic coding practices that have become popular since Codex launched last year.

title: Fitbit 创始人推出人工智能平台帮助家庭监测健康状况
content: Luffu 在后台使用人工智能来收集和组织家庭信息、学习日常模式并标记显着变化，以便家庭能够保持一致并解决潜在的福祉问题。
original_title: Fitbit founders launch AI platform to help families monitor their health
original_content: Luffu uses AI in the background to gather and organize family information, learn day-to-day patterns, and flag notable changes so families can stay aligned and address potential well-being issues.

title: 联盟要求联邦 Grok 禁止未经同意的性内容
content: 在 xAI 聊天机器人生成数千张未经同意的性图像，引发国家安全和儿童安全担忧后，非营利组织敦促美国政府暂停 Grok 在联邦机构的任职资格。
original_title: Coalition demands federal Grok ban over nonconsensual sexual content
original_content: Nonprofits urge the U.S. government to suspend Grok in federal agencies after the xAI chatbot generated thousands of nonconsensual sexual images, raising national security and child safety concerns.

title: 介绍用于高级机器人控制的 NVIDIA Cosmos 策略
original_title: Introducing NVIDIA Cosmos Policy for Advanced Robot Control

title: 启动 HN：Modelence (YC S25) – 使用 TypeScript / MongoDB 框架的应用程序生成器

original_title: Launch HN: Modelence (YC S25) – App Builder with TypeScript / MongoDB Framework
original_content: Hi all, Aram and Eduard here - co-founders of Modelence (https://modelence.com). title: 评估域级对窄微调中出现的突发失调的敏感性
content:
arXiv:2602.00298v1 公告类型：新 
摘要：随着语言模型越来越多地用于自主任务，紧急错位给人工智能安全带来风险。在本文中，我们提出了在跨越 11 个不同领域的不安全数据集上进行微调的大型语言模型 (LLM) 群体，评估
original_title: Assessing Domain-Level Susceptibility to Emergent Misalignment from Narrow Finetuning
original_content:
arXiv:2602.00298v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Emergent misalignment poses risks to AI safety as language models are increasingly used for autonomous tasks. In this paper, we present a population of large language models (LLMs) fine-tuned on insecure datasets spanning 11 diverse domains, evaluatin

title: 英国对 Grok 展开新调查，法国 X 办事处遭突击搜查
